name: Alberta Farm Fresh Producers Locations
description: The GIS (.shp) data set was developed by scraping the Alberta Farm Fresh Producers Association website to pull out the names of the Farm Fresh Producers and the latitude and longitude of their location in order that the resulting .csv file could be brought in to ArcGIS for further analysis. The code used in the scrape is available here: mediagestalt.

distribution.name: Fresh_Farms_Vendor_List_2015_GIS.zip
distribution.description: The .shp file with the locations of Alberta Farm Fresh Producers Association members.
